results.title: Kubernetes Course from a DevOps guru (Kubernetes + Docker)
results.headline: Kubernetes from the ground up, deploy and scale performant, and reliable containerized applications with Kubernetes
objectives_summary: Deploy production-grade applications on Kubernetes
Deploy Highly Available Kubernetes clusters on AWS
Be able to administer, understand, and deploy Kubernetes

results.title: The Docker for DevOps course: From development to production
results.headline: Updated for Docker v17.06. Learn how to build and deploy web applications with Docker in an automated way.
objectives_summary: Learn how to deploy web applications with Docker
Ability to serve your web app securely over SSL (HTTPS)
Confidence to apply for DevOps positions at software companies

results.title: BASH Programming Course: Master the Linux Command Line!
results.headline: Go from beginner to advanced with the Linux command line in this BASH programming course!
objectives_summary: In Depth understanding of Bash programing
Mastery of Linux command line
Knowledge is applicable to jobs related to Linux system maintenance and administration

results.title: Learn DevOps: Infrastructure Automation With Terraform
results.headline: Learn how to automate your infrastructure with terraform. Covers Terraform with AWS, Packer, Docker, ECS, EKS, Jenkins
objectives_summary: Understand, use and apply terraform
Know when to use different features
Use terraform with AWS

results.title: Docker Crash Course for busy DevOps and Developers
results.headline: Learn how to develop and deploy web applications with Docker technologies. Take your DevOps skills to the next level.
objectives_summary: Containerize a web-based application with a microservice approach and automate it using Dockerfile
Design multi-container applications and automate the workflow using Compose
Scale Docker workflow with Docker Swarm, orchestrate and deploy a large-scale application across multiple hosts in the cloud

results.title: The Complete Cyber Security Course : Hackers Exposed!
results.headline: Volume 1 : Become a Cyber Security Specialist, Learn How to Stop Hackers, Prevent Hacking,  Learn IT Security &  INFOSEC
objectives_summary: An advanced practical skillset in defeating all online threats - advanced hackers, trackers, malware and all Internet nastiness including mitigating government spying and mass surveillance.
Become a cyber security specialist.
The very latest up-to-date information and methods.

results.title: Learn Ethical Hacking From Scratch

visible_instructors.title: z Security
visible_instructors.job_title: Leading provider of ethical hacking and cyber security training,
visible_instructors.name: z

results.headline: Become an ethical hacker that can hack computer systems like black hat hackers and secure them like security experts.
objectives_summary: 120 detailed videos about ethical hacking & computer security
Learn what is ethical hacking, its fields and the different types of hackers
Set up a lab environment to practice hacking

results.title: Build your own Manageable Puppet Infrastructure
results.headline: Build your own production-ready Puppet Master and a workflow with code-review. Includes Hiera, Roles&Profiles, R10K etc.
objectives_summary: Setup and use your production-ready Manageable Puppet infrastructure
Setup and use Hiera-eyaml for secure data seperation
Setup and use R10k for environment management

results.title: Mastering Ansible
results.headline: A complete guide to configuration management and orchestration with Ansible.
objectives_summary: Execute ad-hoc commands against servers using Ansible
Write Ansible configuration playbooks to deploy a 3-tier web application
Configure Ansible roles with tasks, handlers, files, templates, and default variables

results.title: Learn How To Code: Google's Go (golang) Programming Language
results.headline: Learn programming from a University Professor in Computer Science with over 15 years of teaching experience.
objectives_summary: Learn how computers work
Learn the fundamentals of programming
Learn modern best-practices for programming

Become Intimately Familiar With The AWS Platform
